snippet: In Florida, a tribute in bronze pays homage to explosive ordnance disposal technicians, a special group within the military that has lost 289 members since 1942.
abstract: In Florida, a tribute in bronze pays homage to explosive ordnance disposal technicians, a special group within the military that has lost 289 members since 1942.

headline.main: Remembering the Dead: New Names for a Wall That Keeps Growing
